desc.1: The Japan DAO Association, JDA, is developing a learning and job-matching platform based on the DAO community on the Polygon and Dfinity blockchains that directly connects DAOs with each other and provides software engineers, creators, marketers, and investors with many encounters and quick business opportunities that transcend job boundaries and positions.
desc.2: What we propose to address the shortage of human resources in the blockchain industry is to provide workers, mainly creators and software engineers, with the skills and the place for practices to become active in DAOs by utilizing decentralized organizations on the blockchain that enable Pear to Pear transactions. JDA also provides a place for training of talented community managers and influencers as well as creators and software engineers, which are in short supply in the industry. To those who want to work at DAOs, mainly creators, software engineers and students from all over the world, JDA will provide them as a DAO with the skills and practices to be active at DAOs.
desc.3: JDA will become a place where many individuals and organizations can meet through JDA or use it as a hub to create and collaborate on business at a speed that traditional organizations cannot.

1.title: DAOs to DAOs Community
1.desc: Learn with like-minded peers, build track records of developing and managing projects, and achieve financial freedom. JDA will create stronger services and experiences that have never been seen before, such as cross-industry collaborations.

2.title: DAO Talent Development
2.desc: JDA develops talents to live in DAOs. By sharing our extraordinary knowledge, JDA will provide participants with valuable skills and connections in the Web 3.0 era, and contribute to the development of blockchain projects and companies that are lacking developers.

3.title: Learning & Job Matching Platform
3.desc: Job Matching provides a place where creators and software engineers can be directly matched with blockchain projects and companies. JDA will provide marketing support to our partner DAOs and other organizations by leveraging our sustained and expanding communities.

1.title: For Those Who Want to Work at DAOs

desc.1: The purpose of this project is to "increase the number of indiduals who can make a living from DAOs".
desc.2: Let's learn with friends, build track records, and get financial freedom.

2.title: For Recruiters in DAOs and Companies
2.desc: DAOs, investors, managers, and corporate recruiters who are hiring can reduce hiring costs and mismatches by communicating with actual job seekers here.
